footer.name: Kamil Bartczak
footer.paragraph: Full Stack Developer passionate about creating exceptional digital experiences through clean code and innovative solutions.

hero.heading: Hi, I'm Kamil Bartczak
hero.paragraph: I create exceptional digital experiences through clean, efficient code and innovative solutions. Passionate about building scalable applications that make a difference.

about.heading: About Me
about.paragraph: Learn more about my journey, passions, and what drives me as a developer
about.my_story_paragraph_0: With over 5 years of experience in software development, I've had the privilege of working on diverse projects ranging from startups to enterprise solutions. My journey began with a curiosity about how things work, which evolved into a passion for creating digital experiences that solve real-world problems.
about.my_story_paragraph_1: I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and staying current with emerging technologies. When I'm not coding, you'll find me contributing to open source projects, mentoring aspiring developers, or exploring the latest in AI and machine learning.

skills.heading: Skills & Expertise
skills.paragraph: A subjective overview of my technical skills and the tools I use to build exceptional software

projects.heading: Projects
projects.paragraph: A selection of projects I've worked on, showcasing different technologies and problem-solving approaches

experience.heading: Experience & Education
experience.paragraph: My professional journey, educational background, and continuous learning achievements

continuous_learning.title: Continuous Learning Journey
continuous_learning.description: I believe in staying current with industry trends and continuously expanding my skill set through professional certifications and hands-on learning. These certifications represent my commitment to excellence and expertise in various technologies.

contact.heading: Get In Touch
contact.paragraph: Have a project in mind or want to discuss opportunities? I'd love to hear from you!
contact.lests_connect_paragraph: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your visions. Feel free to reach out through any of the channels below.

form.title: Send message
form.paragraph: Fill out the form below and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
form.name: Name
form.subject: Subject

validation.submission_error: Something went wrong. Please try again or contact me directly.
